column4: i have some problems with firefox.i cannot use the import wizard.can someone help please
care to share a little more detail?
i am trying to import the totem player into firefox 1.5 but when the wizard appears ,the next button does not function
um, "import the totem player"? what are you trying to do?
ah then you just need to install the appropriate plugin for firefox
and old bookmarks can be imported from the bookmarks manager
i have tried all the plugins from the firefox and restricted format wiki pages but no luck :(
what kind of media are you trying to play? maybe there's no codec for it...?
if you go to the page where the media is embedded you can hit Ctrl+i to get the page info dialog and then it'll be listed in the media tab as embedded media
make sure totem (or whatever program you have installed a firefox plugin for) can play mp3s and if it can't you'll probably need to install the appropriate codecs
any fix ,because my alt+f1 ..... is not working
